SELECT cus_code
FROM fss_account_balance WHERE credit_type = 1
AND credit_begin_time >= DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00'), INTERVAL 0 - (credit_time_interval) DAY) AND credit_end_time <= NOW()

SELECT fab.cus_code, fab.currency_code, fab.credit_end_time, fdr.remaining_repayment_amount
-- IFNULL( fdr.remaining_repayment_amount, 0 ) needReplyAmount
FROM fss_account_balance fab LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM( IFNULL( remaining_repayment_amount, 0 ) ) AS remaining_repayment_amount, currency_code, cus_code, `status` FROM fss_deduction_record WHERE `status` = 1 AND pay_method IN ('BALANCE_DEDUCTIONS','BUSINESS_OPERATE') GROUP BY cus_code, currency_code ) fdr ON fab.cus_code = fdr.cus_code AND fdr.currency_code = fab.currency_code WHERE fab.credit_end_time < NOW() AND IFNULL( fdr.remaining_repayment_amount, 0 ) = 0 AND fab.credit_type = 1 GROUP BY cus_code, fab.currency_code
